name: coruja
short_description: It is a differentiated proposal and a free alternative to network management via the Web using SNMP, because the tool will promote to the professional of area, more efficiency to perform their work. It will be possible to identify abnormalities in network, and is also useful to use as inventory. The tool uses a database that can be updated. This will facilitate the management in accordance with the rules established for the environment. To do so, based on the PMBOK, we used the nine knowledge areas of Project Management Institute (PMI) for the execution of the project of development of tool for network management, in order to achieve excellence in the processes involved in the project management.
